title: Boosted Animals Anonymous.
body:
I would just like to confess I am a boosted Animal.

Half the time I win I get carried.

I usually get carried by my Support like Cleopatra used to get carried by her slaves.

Occasionally I yell at the Jungler so he gets annoyed and goes rampaging the enemy team to prove a point.

Or I argue with the mid laner about mia calls so they sit under turret abusing me which is better than their previous play, then we can go mid and team fight and they just Q a minion wave or something which is basically all we want to do - have them push, rather than continue trying to make plays and feed more.

Occasionally top has something to say, but you just have to throw it back at their face so they switch to siege mode and take top turret so they can wander down and show off their skills or rock slam your char in some form of friendly fire protected harassing expressionism.

I don't always blame my support, but when I do they afk and I love that solo lane XP.

replies.body:
"I usually get carried by my Support like Cleopatra used to get carried by her slaves."

This is the best line I have ever read in these boards :3
Unintentionally referred to them as Slaves. Didn't notice that leeeeeeeeeeeel.

Hi everybody. My names BloodyTompon and I'm a recovering boosted animal. *_applause from group_ *  I've been clean now for 3 years. Every days a struggle. I'd like to thank you guys for supporting me through my continued struggle. *_wipes tears away_*
You are trying too hard to trigger everyone here.
